"wir müssen unsere persönlichen informationen besser schützen! 🚫💻 die datenprivatsphäre ist ein menschenrecht und nichts, das wir für die konvenienz von unternehmen oder regierungen aufgeben sollten. 💪🏼 #datenschutz #privatsphäre #rechte"

translation: "we must protect our personal information! 🚫💻 data privacy is a human right and not something we should give up for the convenience of companies or governments. 💪🏼 #dataprivacy #privacy #rights"

in this post, i'm expressing my opinion on the importance of protecting personal information and data privacy. i believe that it's a human right and that we shouldn't compromise on it for the sake of convenience or profit. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #rechte (rights) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect with others who share the same concerns. the use of the german language and the twitter-style format are intended to make the post relatable and accessible to a german-speaking audience.
